nodes.text: MCR-99 reconnaissance droids were probe droids used by The Shroud to conduct surveillance on the Republic and reconstituted Sith Empire alike. They were repulsorlift powered droids secreted in remote locations on numerous worlds where they remained in place for long periods.

After the Shroud's activities in the Galactic War became known to the Empire and Republic, the MCR-99 droids were located by spacers working for both sides using EV2 discreet reconnaissance macrobinoculars.

MCR-99 droids are hidden objects that were added to the game world of Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion. They are found on every storyline planet and can be located using the macrobinoculars function. The droids have no active gameplay function but are part of the game's achievement system.
